title: From the Stars, Day
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark bottom margin, LR in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]; bott
description: two crescent shaped forms with abstract, forked and zigzagging forms across upper portion of image; in browns and oranges; in lower portion, same abstract shape is echoed vertically in silver pigment, and horizontally in UR; faint silver border
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
